description: The Bridger Mid have long been serious hikers’ favorite boots. They have a short break-in period, are amazingly comfortable in part thanks to its O-FIT insole, and are super durable. No matter the length of your planned journey the Bridger Mid will keep your feet dry with our B-DRY waterproofing technology and their Granite Peak outsole with forefoot plate and rubber toe guard will let you tackle roots, rocks, and more with comfort and confidence.
name: Oboz Bridger Mid B-Dry, Wide - Mens
